PAD_CallLiftFail.synopsis: The player has tried to call the platform in COL while it's already at the level in question.
PAD_CallLiftFail.how_to_trigger: Go to S_COL_Elevator_Controller_Up_9d984a5b-a8b5-47e0-b4a0-f7b559f6d401 and click it while the platform is on the same level.

PAD_ElevatorBanter.synopsis: A banter PAD when taking the elevator down to the Ketheric Showdown from the upper floor of the Colony. If there are two tadpoled players available, they will banter together, otherwise a solo PAD will play.
PAD_ElevatorBanter.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony elevator near 744 14 -22 or S_COL_NearElevator_Up_a32a3736-abc5-4303-82cd-62fe2ac06008- Take the elevator down with one or multiple companions.

PAD_ElevatorBanter_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ElevatorBanter_1.text: Is anyone else's tadpole squirming around a lot more than usual?

PAD_ElevatorBanter_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ElevatorBanter_0.text: Aye. Feels like something down here has them excited... or scared.

PAD_ElevatorBanter_2.speaker: Player
PAD_ElevatorBanter_2.text: My tadpole's squirming like it's excited... or scared.
